name: TNN Motorsports Hardcore 4x4
description: You'll need tough studs and big bolts... Get bent over six radical terrains. White-knuckle driving and extreme weather conditions. Rampage your rig with actual four wheel independent suspension and real vehicle motion. Gut-wrenching multiple views with hard-rocking, adrenaline-pumping music. Max out your truck, crunch the fenders and kiss your competition, but don't drive it into the ground.
